data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anker, Arthur (2019): On three symbiotic species of the alpheid shrimp genus Salmoneus Holthuis, 1955 from the Indo-West Pacific, including one new to science (Malacostraca: Decapoda: Caridea). Zootaxa 4651 (1): 51-63, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4651.1.3|6 occurrences
